title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset. As part of the template requirements, the UI should not perform validation.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset.
3. Try to create a new table group.
